posts.post_title: FS/FT:T206 Cy Young Bare Hand & Portrait SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jason Silvey
Asking $230 for the Bare Hand & $270 for the Portrait, $485 for both. Would condsider trade for or toward any T206 Cobbs. Prices include shipping & insurance. PayPal add 3%.
